channel.title: Cybersecurity on Gastón Palomeque
channel.description: Recent content in Cybersecurity on Gastón Palomeque

item.title: Hacking techniques
item.description:
Our information isn’t and will never be 100% safe, for those that are interesed in learning more about cybersecurity and hacking techniques, here are some of them.

Unencrypted services

It’s clear that most people prioritize functionality and usability over security and privacy, they aren’t forced to use services lacking this last two principles but it’s still necessary to show them what really happens behind the scenes.

For example, it wasn’t until 2016 that Whatsapp implemented end-to-end encryption (basically anyone intercepting your’s smartphone traffic was able to read your conversations), or Zoom, whose calls were super unencrypted during the most of the 2020 and people still kept using them; Discord is another one offering unencrypted services.
